svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2024-01-08T15:18:32.054Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="Idnc0PcYEiQrw1pVfozz" version="22.1.17" type="github"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="oz84woj-ltPEHpdHrwoj"> <mxGraphModel dx="1723" dy="1555" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="qDSY1o428jUMmlW_Z1PK-1" value="HAL" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="230" y="320" width="180" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qDSY1o428jUMmlW_Z1PK-2" value="Drivers" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="230" y="250" width="180" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qDSY1o428jUMmlW_Z1PK-3" value="Ibex" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="230" y="390" width="390" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qDSY1o428jUMmlW_Z1PK-4" value="OS" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="430" y="250" width="190" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qDSY1o428jUMmlW_Z1PK-5" value="App" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;verticalAlign=top;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="230" y="130" width="390" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qDSY1o428jUMmlW_Z1PK-6" value="Tests" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="160" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qDSY1o428jUMmlW_Z1PK-7" value="Demos" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="369" y="160" width="122" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qDSY1o428jUMmlW_Z1PK-8" value="Apps" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="500" y="160" width="110" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qDSY1o428jUMmlW_Z1PK-9" value="Tools" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;verticalAlign=top;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="639" y="130" width="140" height="310" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qDSY1o428jUMmlW_Z1PK-11" value="xmake<br>build system" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="649" y="190" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qDSY1o428jUMmlW_Z1PK-12" value="LLVM CHERIOT<br>Toolchain" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="649" y="260" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qDSY1o428jUMmlW_Z1PK-13" value="Nix<br>(build dependencies manager)" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="649" y="330" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qDSY1o428jUMmlW_Z1PK-14" value="Simulation" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;verticalAlign=top;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="70" y="130" width="140" height="310" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qDSY1o428jUMmlW_Z1PK-15" value="Verilator" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="223" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="qDSY1o428jUMmlW_Z1PK-16" value="FPGA<br>(Sonata board)" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="293" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
